thread.title: Prep Roundup - Belding downs Sparta, undefeated in league play
thread.title_full: Prep Roundup - Belding downs Sparta, undefeated in league play

author: Staff Reports
title: Prep Roundup - Belding downs Sparta, undefeated in league play
text: Posted Oct. 13, 2015 at 11:11 PM By Staff Reports Posted Oct. 13, 2015 at 11:11 PM VOLLEYBALL Belding 3, Sparta 0: Belding hosted Sparta on Tuesday and won yet again to bring their record to 24-1-1 and 7-1 in the OK Blue. They won 25-18, 25-21 and 25-15. Brooke Linebaugh had 37 assists, Greta Wilker had two aces, one block and 21 digs while Johanna McCully had 10 kills and a block. Sarah Bronwell had 14 kills and Kim Thomas had one block. TENNIS Haslett 6, Portland 2: In a final tune-up before the state finals this weekend, the Raiders lost at home. The only wins came from number four singles Chris Platte, who won 6-3, 6-3 and number four doubles, Jarrett Hoppes and Ryan Lefke, 2-6, 6-1 (10). CROSS COUNTRY SARANAC - At the Saranac Color Run on Tuesday, the Pewamo-Westphalia boy’s team finished in first with 30 points while the girl’s finished first with 29 points. Saranac boy’s were fight with 137 points while the girl’s were fourth with 94 points. Belding boy’s finished eighth with 182 points while the girl’s finished second with 39 points. Portland St. Patrick boy’s finished seventh with 157 points. Pewamo-Westphalia Boy’s: Jr. Bryce Thelen, 2nd (17:00.1), Jr. Brock Simon, 4th (17:24.5), Sr. Grant Hengesbach, 5th (17:33.6) Girl’s: Sr. Audrey Pohl, 2nd (19:50.0), Jr. Brenna Wirth, 4th (20:11.2), So. Brooklyn Nurenberg, 5th (20:16.3) Saranac Boy’s: Jr. Connor McElvain, 10th (17:48.3), Sr. Jared Melcher, 18th (18:14.3), Sr. Branden Smith, 27th (18:41.1) Girl’s: Fr. Katelyn Haskins, 14th (21:34.3), Fr. Sidney Klynstra, 15th (21:36.7), Sr. Madelyn Miller, 17th (21:37.5) Belding Boy’s: Jr. Royce Braman, 25th (18:28.2), Jr. Blake Flynn, 36th (19:29.4), So. Jared Miteer, 39th (19:40.0) Girl’s: Sr. Teresa Myles, 3rd (20:01.5), So. Victoria Wittenbach, 6th (20:24.6), Jr. Alexa Syrjala, 7th (20:34.7) Portland St. Patrick Boy’s: Sr. Isaac Brown, 6th (17:34.3), Jr. Graham Smith, 17th (18:13.6), Sr. Joe Weller, 37th (19:34.9) Girl’s: Fr. Cordelia FoxElster, 38th (23:40.8), Fr. Summer Russman, 53rd (25:31.5), Jr. Sammi Leonard, 62nd (26:24.9) By Staff Reports
